name: SeaTable Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when SeaTable events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 SeaTable Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when SeaTable events occur

pollTimes.name: pollTimes
pollTimes.description: Time at which polling should occur
pollTimes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Poll Times | 作用: Time at which polling should occur | 默认值: {'item': [{'mode': 'everyMinute'}]}

tableName.name: tableName
tableName.description: The name of SeaTable table to access. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
tableName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table Name or ID | 作用: The name of SeaTable table to access. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

event.name: event
event.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event | 默认值: rowCreated
available_options: Row Created (值: rowCreated) - Trigger on newly created rows

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True
